mapper.select: SELECT A.*, H.reviewcnt FROM (SELECT place_uid, contentid, contenttypeid, title, mapx, mapy, areaCode, sigunguCode, addr1, tel, firstimage2, pl_viewcnt AS viewcnt FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM place ORDER BY place_uid DESC) T) WHERE RNUM >= #{from} AND RNUM < (#{from} + #{pageRows})) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PLACE_UID ,count(*) AS reviewcnt FROM REVIEW group BY PLACE_UID ) H ON A.place_uid = H.place_uid
SELECT place_uid , title, contentid, contenttypeid, mapx, mapy, pl_viewcnt viewcnt FROM place WHERE contentid = #{contentid}
mapper.update: UPDATE place SET pl_viewcnt = pl_viewcnt + 1 WHERE contentid = #{contentid}
